name: Building Blocks (Arrow)
description:
Build your own levels in this exciting new puzzle platformer!
Use the mouse to rearrange each level to suit your needs.

Complete each by reaching the flag and gather as many gems as you can find.

Will you collect enough gems to fill the ancient alter and open the magical gate?

WASD to Move.

Space to Jump.

Use the mouse to move blocks while in Build Mode.

Escape to quit.

P to toggle fullscreen.

Created By Gideon (Arrow).

With help from the amazing and beautiful Natalein <3
